synopsis.text:
Due to unbearable domestic strife, siblings Ren and Mihato Uesugi are compelled to flee their home, embarking on a challenging journey to find employment and a new place to live in the city. Their fortunes take a turn when they stumble upon the grand Kuonji estate and its eccentric inhabitants - the three Kuonji sisters: Shinra, Miyu, and Yume. The siblings seize the opportunity to work as servants in the mansion, eagerly pledging their loyalty to their new employers.

As Ren navigates the complexities of his new role as a butler, he finds himself surrounded by a diverse cast of characters, including the mansion's additional staff and the sisters' friends. The job is far from easy, with peculiar challenges ranging from unconventional sibling affection to competitive household games. However, with the support of the enigmatic head-butler Colonel and the resourceful head maid Benisu, Ren and Mihato might just learn the ropes of being exceptional servants.

Will Ren and Mihato's newfound employment turn out to be a blessing or a curse? Join them as they adapt to their intriguing new lives in the Kuonji mansion, where every day brings unexpected twists and turns.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
